scripts.build:android:preview: NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_ENV=DEV sh envscript.sh && npx expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile preview --local
scripts.build:android:prod: NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_ENV=PROD sh envscript.sh && npx expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile production --local
scripts.build:ios:prod: NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_ENV=PROD npx expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p ios --profile production --local
scripts.build:ios:preview: NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_ENV=DEV npx expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p ios --profile preview --local
